amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3695, as amended, agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 3695 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 24. Record Vote Number: 192.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 314(a) of S. Con. Res. 70, 110th Congress, raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3695.
Cloture on amendment SA 3695 invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 90 - 6. Record Vote Number: 190.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 3695 presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 3695 proposed by Senator Shelby. (consideration: CR S5685-5689) In the nature of a substitute.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3695 proposed by Senator Shelby.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3695, as amended, agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
